name: ORD_OPIMS_OVERRIDE_ERX
description: This group of tables stores information about the override that a clinician entered when they chose to not use the products chosen by outpatient Intelligent Medication Selection (IMS). This table stores the list of Medications (ERX) chosen by outpatient IMS, found in the OPIMS Overridden Suggested Product (I ORD 11603) item.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: COMPONENT_ID
columns.description: Stores the product that Intelligent Medication Selection (IMS) suggested
